name: Antonio BUNDY, Appellant, v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary for the Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellee

parties: Antonio BUNDY, Appellant, v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary for the Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of December, 2007, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
941 A.2d 646
Antonio BUNDY, Appellant, v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary for the Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 27, 2007.
